Header: Traditional Kap Situweema of the Kandy Esala Festival takes place
Content: The traditional Kap Situweema of the Kandy Esala Festival took place this morning at the Aluthnuwara Sri Dedi Munda Devalaya in Mawanella. Following the event, they were taken in a possession to Kandy. Later the Kap Situweema of the Kandy Esala Perahera will take place.
